name: Rayhound

ability.name: Jumping Force
ability.description: Can be ridden. Can double jump while mounted.

description: At full speed, it could be mistaken for a bolt of lightning. If two Rayhounds collide, the sound is like that of a powerful thunderclap.

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.description: Quickly discharges electricity, shocking those around it.

skills.name: Spark Blast
skills.description: The user releases a lightning ball that expands outward in a forward, circular pattern.

skills.name: Stone Blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: Electric Ball
skills.description: Fires an electric ball that slowly pursues an enemy.

skills.name: Lightning Streak
skills.description: Generates a lightning bolt that moves forward in a line.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: Charges electric energy before blasting enemies with a powerful shock.
